abstract: Chambers Bay Golf Course, which is hosting its first United States Open, proves problematic for many top golfers.
lead_paragraph: The high drama of the weekend rounds at the United States Open might be the race to see which of the world’s best golfers unravels the mysteries of Chambers Bay first.

headline.main: Chambers Bay Has Even Leaders Scratching Their Heads
headline.print_headline: Chambers Bay Has Even Leaders Scratching Their Heads
